pullRequest.title: PLFM-6494 - Handle correct exception type and add autowired test
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://sagebionetworks.jira.com/browse/PLFM-6494
The prior fix (#4229 ) did not handle the correct exception (the exception was caught and wrapped in a different exception class at a lower level). I added a test to the autowired suite to ensure that the correct exception is thrown and handled.

commit.message: Handle correct exception type and add autowired test

nodes.bodyText:
In the interest of strong typing I would suggest an alternative fix, something like:
Define a class org.sagebionetworks.DuplicateKeyException that extends IllegalArgumentException.
In DBOBasicDaoImpl.insert, catch org.springframework.dao.DuplicateKeyException and throw org.sagebionetworks.DuplicateKeyException.
Here, in PersonalAccessTokenManagerImpl, catch org.sagebionetworks.DuplicateKeyException and throw an exception (either  org.sagebionetworks.DuplicateKeyException or IllegalArgumentException) with DUPLICATE_TOKEN_NAME_MSG (as currently shown at line 130).

commit.message: Use instanceof e.getCause() to verify the DuplicateKeyException

nodes.bodyText: I double checked that this works if e.getCause() == null
